snippet: Karch Kiraly, one of the most decorated volleyball players ever, was chosen as the coach of the American women’s volleyball team in preparation for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.
abstract: Karch Kiraly, one of the most decorated volleyball players ever, is chosen as the coach of the American women’s volleyball team in preparation for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.
lead_paragraph: Karch Kiraly, one of the most decorated volleyball players ever, was chosen as the coach of the American women’s volleyball team in preparation for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.seo: Karch Kiraly to Coach U.S. Women’s Volleyball Team
headline.main: Karch Kiraly Will Coach U.S. Women
